name: International Union of Operating Engineers, Local No. 66, AFL-CIO, v. Hallstrom et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: International Union of Operating Engineers, Local No. 66 v. Hallstrom

judges: Before Bum, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: International Union of Operating Engineers, Local No. 66, AFL-CIO, v. Hallstrom et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Anthony S. Guido, with him Gleason, Cherry <& Guido, for appellants.
Sanford A. Segal, with him Gats, Cohen & O’Brien, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
International Union of Operating Engineers, Local No. 66, AFL-CIO, v. Hallstrom et al., Appellants.
Argued October 7, 1968.
Before Bum, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused December 27, 1968.
Anthony S. Guido, with him Gleason, Cherry <& Guido, for appellants.
Sanford A. Segal, with him Gats, Cohen & O’Brien, for appellee.
November 12, 1968:
